nav.div: Johnson City Central School District » COVID-19 » Educational Announcements

div.div:
--Johnson City Central School District Regents Cancellation (PDF)

Johnson City Elementary School Remote Learning Plan (PDF)
Johnson City Middle School Remote Learning Plan (PDF)
Johnson City High School Remote Learning Plan (PDF)
--PLEASE NOTE: Current rumors of school being closed for the remainder of the school year are not true. As of Monday, April 6, the Johnson City Central School District is still closed through April 28. The district will officially notify all students, parents and caregivers if that date changes.
--College Board is offering online review classes for all AP classes...here is the schedule: (PDF)

div.br:
--Parents and students can access Google Classrooms from their phones by downloading the app. Here are the directions:
https://support.google.com/edu/classroom/answer/6118412?hl=en
--Updates for all AP students as of 3/20/2020
https://apcentral.collegeboard.org/about-ap/news-changes/coronavirus-update
--The New York State Education Department has announced the cancellation of the following exams for the 19-20 school year:

div.div: New York State Alternate Assessment for all grades
div.br:
--The May 2 SAT exam has been canceled. Click HERE for more information.
--The April 14 ACT exam has been rescheduled to June 13. Click HERE for more details.
